translated: In the Direction of Nibbāna, the Reverse Order, the Triad, the Conditional Relations in the Triad

original: 15.80. Saraṇaduka, Sekkhattika🔽Araṇaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Araṇaṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇa duka sekkhattika  araṇam sekkham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka  araṇam asekkham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: The Non-Root-Caused, the Trainee, the Adept🔽With a non-root-caused, trainee, condition … a non-root-caused, non-trainee, condition …🔽With a non-root-caused, adept, condition … a non-root-caused, non-trainee, condition …

original: Araṇaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With a non-root-caused, neither-trainee-nor-non-trainee, condition … a non-root-caused, non-trainee, condition …
